# fontMenu(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the menu that’s connected to the font conversion system, creating it if necessary.

## Declaration

```swift
func fontMenu(_ create: Bool) -> NSMenu?
```

## Parameters

- **create**: If [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the menu object is created if necessary; if [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it is not.

## Return Value

The font conversion system menu.

## Managing the Font Panel and Font Menu

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the font conversion system’s Font panel and Font menu items are enabled.
- **fontPanel(_:)**: Returns the application’s shared Font panel object, creating it if necessary.
- **setFontMenu(_:)**: Records the given menu as the application’s Font menu.
